headline: XRP futures bag $19M on launch day
summary: XRP futures launched on CME with $19M in first-day trades, signaling strong institutional demand.

headline: CME Group Announces First Trades of XRP Futures
summary: CME Group announced its new XRP futures are now available for trading. The first trade, a block, took place on Sunday, May 18, and was cleared by Hidden Road. CME GroupXRP futures are available in...

headline: XRP Futures Rack Up $1.5M Trading Volumes on CME Debut
summary: Early reporting data from CME showed a volume of 4 for standard contracts and 106 for micro contracts.
